name: Sound Swipe!
description:
This game was made during 2017's BHAM JAM.  My last jam entry  had no audio... so to make up for that I decided to do something audio-based and learn some Web Audio API in the process... It's also an experiment on using the data in a song file to generate game content - the puzzle will always be different with each play. The audio is interactive as well - so be assured nothing's wrong with your ears when you hear muffled music at the beginning!

I honestly have yet to test this out on mobile devices, so no promises there.  Also - sorry, no kitty cats...

To make this I used an HTML5 Canvas library called Konva. js. I made the music from scratch using LMMS. Aside from the song, it's all code. Thank you for playing!
